channel.title: IDEs on Max Stanley Docs
channel.description: Recent content in IDEs on Max Stanley Docs

item.title: VSCode
item.description: Visual Studio Code, is the easiest recommendation I can make. Due to the large number of plugins, and simple integration with many languages and their debuggers, their are very few reasons why a beginner would not start with VSCode. Plugins VSCode provides developers access to a Marketplace of extensions that add useful functionality.
